column4: i have windows..can i use ubuntu as a 2nd OS without installing any other programs besides ubuntu?
aks: ram isnt very plentiful on my comp =p
you can you can i do it with 512 ram... you only can use an os at a time :)
if you install ubuntu an want to keep windows, its possible, it will install a boot loader *(grub) and you can choose which one on startup
